narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
The applicant wants to be licensed as a Class C Exhibitor.
Record keeping requirements were discussed with the applicant.
The applicant will mail the license fee for $30.00 to:
USDA/APHIS/AC
920 Main Campus Drive
Suite #200
Raleigh, NC 27606
No regulated activities can be conducted until a valid USDA license has been obtained.
Inspection and exit briefing  conducted with the applicant.
End of report.
